channel.title: Magic dart help

item.title: Magic dart help
item.dc:creator: @java_coder java coderâ„¢
item.description:
@java_coder wrote:

i just recently tried to make my own magic dart spell. and its almost working but i need to fix the emote and a little on projectile heres the code:

if(magicID == 12037)// SlayerDart { if(playerLevel[6]>=60) { if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4170 == false) { sendMessage("You must be wielding a slayer's staff."); } if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4170 == true) { if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 11)==false && playerHasItemAmount(558, 4)==false)) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 11)==true && playerHasItemAmount(558, 4)==true)) { if(charge >= 1) { startAnimation(716); hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(30); } else { startAnimation(716); hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(20); } PkingDelay = 3; deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 11); deleteItem(558, getItemSlot(558), 4); addSkillXP((100*hitDiff), playerMagic); ProjectileSpell(328, 328, 328, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, npcIndex, EnemyY2, EnemyX2, 27, 1, 566, 4278, 554, 5, 1, 7); bodygfx(329, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); } } } }

anyone know the emote?

Look at pic :

Read full topic
